name: Joe Henderson
description: '''Joe Henderson''' (April 24, 1937 – June 30, 2001) was an American [[jazz]] [[tenor saxophonist]] and very occasional flute player. In a career spanning more than four decades, Henderson played with many of the leading American players of his day and recorded for several prominent labels, including [[Blue Note Records|Blue Note]], [[Milestone Records|Milestone]], and [[Verve Records|Verve]].
